name: Tidymax
overview:
TidyMAX provides reliable and quality services delivered to our patrons with great care and consideration. Homeowners, business entities, and institutional clients depend on our ability to provide essential services within specified time and site conditions. Our capability springs from the strength of trained technical staff, vital equipments to perform the work, our experience in problem solving, compliance to industry standards, and ability to maintain communications with the customer. As our customer, you can depend on us for – Carpet Cleaning, Upholstery Cleaning, Odor Control, Bacterial Remediation Service Tile and Grout Cleaning, Water Damage Restoration …

We combine the industry’s leading customer service policy as to position ourselves to be the best in the market today. For customizing your service needs, we can register you on our network system and provide a personalized service on a regular basis, as well as support you with our educational and information sharing tools. We are focusing on creating a knowledge base for our customer use, in their everyday cleaning problem solving needs and to gather information on restoration and cleaning related issues. Our promise – You are in safe hands when you are with TidyMAX! Our promise – You are in safe hands, with TidyMAX!
